Articles.Content:
Ok seeing as Squad is staying in the stone age with 32x bit engine anyone got tips for RAM saving?

Reducing mod IS NOT a option as I find the game bland and dull without them and the whole point is to increase mod ussage.

Im using force open GL and active texture management, anything else?

I tried switching to linux but it doesn't like my graphic card too much.

Modding on Windows is very limited. If you don't want to remove mods, use Linux. If you don't want to use Linux, remove mods.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-19T16:27:08Z" title="05/19/2015 04:27  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 19, 2015</time> by Shurikeeen**
